item.title: Flix Bakery Biscuit Recipe
item.description:
INGREDIENTS

  • 300 grams of flour (25% of which should be made up of, if possible, Rye Flour; Wheat Bran; Oat Flakes; Sesame Seeds; Sunflower Seeds & Flax / Linseed)
  • 200 grams of Oats
  • 170 grams of Brown Sugar
  • 230 grams Butter
  • Apricot Jam for the “finger print”

METHOD

180 degrees C - 200 degrees C for 9 minutes

item.title: Mary Furlong's Crunchy Biscuits
item.description:
• 4oz porridge oats
  • 4oz self-raising flour
  • 4o4 butter
  • 3oz demerara sugar
  • 1 dessertspoon golden syrup
  • 1 rounded teaspoon ground ginger

Method

  1. Pre-heat oven to 170C, Gas 3

  2. Heat butter, sugar, syrup over getle heat until sugar dissolved.

  3. Sift flour into mixing bowl. Add porridge oats, ground ginger. Pour in melted mixture and combine thoroughly.

  4. Roll small quantities into small balls. Put on graesed baking trays and press down to flatten. Leave plently of room between biscuits..
